attributes.action: give every british citizen the right to free tea and biscuits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to long have i stood by whilst tea and biscuits have been given to forigen diplomats. i claim that we the taxpayer should finally benifit from the perks of the british system. seriously im very hached off about it

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
